page.title: 10PETS
page.content: A pet is an indoor or outdoor animal that people keep for company.Some people don't have a pet because they do not like animals.You can have all sorts of animals for pets like - rabbits,cats dogs,guinea pigs,budgies,ducks etc. Karla is 7yrs. old she has got five pets a cat,a rabbit,two guinea pigs and some goldfish.We asked twenty three people in our school if they had a pet -twenty said yes.This is a list of the pets they had - Guinea pigs - 2, Cats - 13, fish -3,dogs - 11, rabbits - 9, duck - 1.
